generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide asphalt road with white lane markings, extending across the entire frame.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas with people are visible along the sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and poles.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the background, including a large white building on the left and a historic-style building on the right.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalks and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and vegetation, appearing overcast.
- person: Several people are visible walking or standing on the sidewalks and near the bus stop.
- rider: A person on a bicycle is visible on the right side of the image.
- bus: A red and white bus is visible on the right side of the image.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible throughout the image, including those supporting overhead wires and traffic signs.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersections.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including circular signs and directional signs.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the right side of the image, near the bus stop.
